# Problem 2
## Import dataset
```{r}
weather_df = 
  rnoaa::meteo_pull_monitors(
    c("USW00094728"),
    var = c("PRCP", "TMIN", "TMAX"), 
    date_min = "2022-01-01",
    date_max = "2022-12-31") |>
  mutate(
    name = recode(id, USW00094728 = "CentralPark_NY"),
    tmin = tmin / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10) |>
  select(name, id, everything())
```
## Fit with linear regression model
```{r}
fit = lm(tmax ~ tmin + prcp, data = weather_df)

fit |> 
  broom::glance()

fit |> 
  broom::tidy()
```
